data.title: A new chapter of TPP was leaked by WikiLeaks to Peruvian newspaper La Republica | The chapter specifies that companies will be able to sue the state when they lose profits, or the expectation of profits, due to social conflicts and changes in the public health or environmental codes of a nation.
Antarctica reaches 63F, highest temperature ever recorded.
Air Canada flight crashes on runway in Halifax
Possibility of life in our solar system found to be greatest on Europa, Enceladus, and Ganymede
The Director-General of the BBC is being protected by an elite squad of bodyguards after 'credible' death threats were made against him in retribution for the firing of Jeremy Clarkson
Elephant Massacre Uncovered In Democratic Republic of Congo; 30 Killed In 15 Days
Indonesian cops burn 1,000 pounds of seized marijuana, fumes get whole neighborhood high
Arab League creates joint military force

Tens of thousands of Tunisians marched through the capital in a show of solidarity against Islamist militants, hours after the government said its forces had killed nine members of a group suspected of carrying out this month's deadly Bardo Museum attack
Putin to Arab League: Palestinians have right to state with capital in east Jerusalem
